data.codeDesc: E057: No attribute sets linked to that category.
data.solution: No attributes are linked to the specified category.
The category ID in the request is in Inactive state and cannot be used. Please call GetCategoryTree to query the latest category.

data.name: app_key
data.desc: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

data.name: timestamp
data.desc: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

apiList.title: GetCategoryAttributes

children.desc: When the attribute is key attribute, is_key_prop = 1.  When the attribute is not key attribute,  is_key_prop = 0.
Human-readable display name of the attribute
Attribute input type (text, date,numeric,img,rich text, singleSelect，multiSelect,enumInput,multiEnumInput) multiEnumInput/multiEnumInput supports custom value
Whether the attribute is sale property

input.desc: Language code indicates the type of language you would like to translate. Please note not all languages are available in every region. For example, in Indonesia, only English and Indonesia are available.  If you are passing a language code which does not belong to your area, null value might receive. Please do make sure your language code is correct. Supported  language codes are listed as below: English:"en_US"  -  available in every area     Singapore:"en_SG" - available in Singapore    Thailand"th_TH" - available in Thailand     Indonesia:"id_ID" - available in Indonesia     Vietnam:"vi_VN" - available in Vietnam    Philippines: "fil_PH" - available in Philippines     Malaysia : "ms_MY" - available in Malaysia     Default(if null is passed): "en_US"

requestCodes.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/category/attributes/get','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("primary_category_id", "8704")
request.add_api_parameter("language_code", "en_US")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/category/attributes/get','GET')
request.add_api_param('primary_category_id', '8704')
request.add_api_param('language_code', 'en_US')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

data.name: language_code
data.desc: Language code indicates the type of language you would like to translate. Please note not all languages are available in every region. For example, in Indonesia, only English and Indonesia are available.  If you are passing a language code which does not belong to your area, null value might receive. Please do make sure your language code is correct. Supported  language codes are listed as below: English:"en_US"  -  available in every area     Singapore:"en_SG" - available in Singapore    Thailand"th_TH" - available in Thailand     Indonesia:"id_ID" - available in Indonesia     Vietnam:"vi_VN" - available in Vietnam    Philippines: "fil_PH" - available in Philippines     Malaysia : "ms_MY" - available in Malaysia     Default(if null is passed): "en_US"

apiList.desc: Use this API to get a list of attributes for a specified product category.
